articles.description: India and Pakistan will warm up for the World Cup in the Asia Cup. Recently, Rohit Sharma was asked to name the toughest Pakistani bowler. | Cricket
articles.content: Remember when Rohit Sharma unleashed a rib-tickling response to stump a reporter, who asked him to share his advice for Pakistan batters at ICC World Cup 2019? Rohit's noteworthy remark about coachin… [+2884 chars]
